title: Got a problem with the new bloodline story.
body:
The line "Hundreds of people thronged the wide street leading to the broken walls of the city. ****Aromatic smoke drifted like fog from the bubbling pipes of the old men**** sitting in doorways like wizened sages."
But {{champion:104}} cant have a cigar

replies.body: I will correct my if I will ever change my mind, but in my opinion this is never getting old
